newsitems.headline: It’s Time To Unite Against The Real Enemy
newsitems.summary: When Ron DeSantis abruptly canceled his media appearances over the weekend, it led to a lot of speculation that he’d be ending his presidential campaign. On Sunday, that’s exactly what happened. Facing the prospect of a distant third-place finish in the New Hampshire primary, DeSantis bowed out and endorsed Donald Trump.

newsitems.headline: Elon Musk Slams DEI During Discussion With Ben Shapiro: ‘Could Come Out Of A George Orwell Book’
newsitems.summary: Tech entrepreneur Elon Musk, who owns the social media giant X, blasted Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) and its prevalence on college campuses on Monday.
